QuestData.Title: The Gentle Giant
QuestData.Description:
If Taivan is really as "un-ferocious" as Jadar says he is, perhaps he'll be better suited as a herding bakar!
The Aylaag are expert argali shepherds, and aren't so proud that they require lavish gifts to help another clan.
Please send Taivan to Shepherd Tevatei at the Mallakh, a spot between two hills in the south-west where they train their bakar.
Ohn'ahra, please let this work. If it doesn't, I'm all out of ideas.
QuestData.LogDescription: Send Taivan to Shepherd Tevatei at the Mallakh to be trained.
QuestData.RewardText: Well hello there, newcomer. What can I do for you and your very large friend?

Objectives.Objective: Meet Shepherd Tevatei at the Mallakh
